verses.name: Psalms 115:12
verses.text: The Lord hath been mindful of us: he will bless us; he will bless the house of Israel; he will bless the house of Aaron.

verses.name: Psalms 115:13
verses.text: He will bless them that fear the Lord, both small and great.

verses.name: Psalms 115:14
verses.text: The Lord shall increase you more and more, you and your children.

verses.name: Psalms 115:15
verses.text: Ye are blessed of the Lord which made heaven and earth.

verses.name: Psalms 115:16
verses.text: The heaven, even the heavens, are the Lord’s: but the earth hath he given to the children of men.

verses.name: Psalms 115:17
verses.text: The dead praise not the Lord, neither any that go down into silence.
